statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT business_name, location FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE registration_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT business_id, business_name, compliance_status FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY last_check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' AND location = 'Canada';
SELECT business_id, business_name, registration_date FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE business_id = 1;
SELECT business_name, location, registration_date FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT business_id, business_name, location, compliance_status FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE compliance_status = 'Rejected' ORDER BY last_check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT business_id, business_name, compliance_status, last_check_date FROM cryptocurrency_compliance_check WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY date_of_check DESC;
SELECT business_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_checks WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT business_name, transaction_type FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_checks WHERE business_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY date_of_check DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT business_name, date_of_check FROM compliance_checks WHERE date_of_check BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy'
SELECT business_name, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_checks GROUP BY business_name
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY
SELECT * FROM crypto_businesses;
SELECT business_name, location FROM crypto_businesses;
SELECT business_id, registration_date FROM crypto_businesses ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE result = 'pass';
SELECT business_name, check_date FROM crypto_businesses JOIN compliance_checks ON crypto_businesses.business_id = compliance_checks.business_id;
SELECT * FROM crypto_businesses ORDER BY business_name DESC;
SELECT business_name, location FROM crypto_businesses WHERE registration_date >= '2020-01-01';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, cb.business_name, cc.result FROM transactions t JOIN crypto_businesses cb ON t.business_id = cb.business_id JOIN compliance_checks cc ON t.business_id = cc.business_id WHERE cc.result = 'Passed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT cb.business_name, cc.check_date, cc.checked_by, cc.result FROM compliance_checks cc JOIN crypto_businesses cb ON cc.business_id = cb.business_id WHERE cc.check_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';

SELECT cb.business_id, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM crypto_businesses cb LEFT JOIN transactions t ON cb.business_id = t.business_id GROUP BY cb.business_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_checks WHERE compliance_status = True;
SELECT business_name, business_type FROM Compliance_checks WHERE compliance_status = True;
SELECT * FROM Customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT license_id, business_id, license_type, expiration_date FROM Business_licenses LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_checks WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT business_name, compliance_status FROM Compliance_checks WHERE business_type = 'Retail' ORDER BY business_name DESC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_department FROM Compliance_officers WHERE officer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT business_id, license_type, expiration_date FROM Business_licenses WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceChecks LIMIT 5;
SELECT business_name, location FROM ComplianceChecks WHERE check_type = 'Safety' ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT check_id, business_name, location, check_type FROM ComplianceChecks WHERE check_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BusinessOwners WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT owner_name, email, phone_number FROM BusinessOwners WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceChecks WHERE check_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT business_name, location FROM ComplianceChecks WHERE check_type = 'Fire Safety';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_checks FROM ComplianceChecks;
SELECT c.business_name, r.result FROM ComplianceChecks c JOIN ComplianceReports r ON c.check_id = r.check_id;
SELECT * FROM BusinessOwners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
